name: My inspirational Sewing machine
description:
Another little gem for all your craft-y people out there!

A little metal 3D sewing machine sitting atop a wooden block, whispering "inspire"! May this little fella inspire you whilst you craft your day way.

Measurements:-
Length - Approx 42cm or 17inches. (gold plated metal link chain with adjustable extensions. If you need it to be a certain length just let me know when you purchase and I'll adjust it before sending it out!).

Please feel free to contcat me at shupg@hotmail.com should you have any queries.

*All prices are in USD and all payments by paypal only. 

Thank you for looking! :D

name: Spring flowers
description:
These 2 are of the same "laced flower" line. There's one in black and one in white, both have a different "feel" in my opinion. Pick one that suits you or your mood for the day!

Measurements:-
Length - Approx 9cm or 4inches. (from top of hook to bottom of the dangle.

Please feel free to contcat me at shupg@hotmail.com should you have any queries.

*All prices are in USD and all payments by paypal only.

name: Ducks at the Pond
description:
Line up the troops... of ducks, that is! These wooden mother duck with her cute round bill is leading her flock of fluffy ducklings for their daily dip in the pond! Quack!

Oh but wait... who's that last in line? An ugly duckling? Perhaps just a slow poke trying to catch up :) Take a look yourself!

ONE-OF-A-KIND!

I only have 1 at the moment so please do act quickly if you like it! :D I may make others (though they'll all differ slightly in colour and style)

Measurements:-
Length - Approx 7cm or 3inches in diameter.

Please do contact me at shupg@hotmail.com should you have any 
queries. 

Thank you for looking! :) 

All prices are in USD and all payments to be made by paypal only.

name: I love you Letter necklace
description:
This gold envelope necklace is a perfect Valentines, birthday gift, or simply to treat yourself to a great year ahead!

This little envelope comes with an insert of an "I love you" letter, a clear green czech leaf bead, a vintage pink plastic flower cameo and a simple white lace flower charm.

Measurements:-
Length - Approx 38cm or 15inches. (Dark gold antique finish metal chain with adjustable extensions. If you need it to be a certain length just let me know when you purchase and I'll adjust it before sending it out!).
Please do contact me at shupg@hotmail.com should you have any 
queries. 

Thank you for looking! :) 

All prices are in USD and all payments to be made by paypal only.

name: Caged Freedom Above Grey Clouds
description:
I have a penchant for puffy-felt-bits thus I've created this unique birdcage necklace with a handsewn felt side-dish with a lovely vintage coral lily and some of my favourite polka-dot materials. And can you spot the 2 flower-glass-beads atop the birdcage?

Colours: You can choose from white, olive green, red, light blue, yellow and burnt orange.

Let your imagination fly free!

ONE-OF-A-KIND!

Measurements:-
Length - approx 47cm or 18.5 inches.

I've decided instead of metal chain, to give this a more romantic/ethereal feel, I've used beige lace/green polka-dot ribbon and sky-blue ribbon.

And to make it easier to wear, it comes with gold clasps (slightly adjustable length).

Please feel free to convo me should you have any queries.
